content.raw:
It is very difficult to write code to manage the harness, because if you miss the 'Done' (0) message, you effectively cannot know the state of the harness.

Could that be sent steadily, as it is when it's being lowered?

(As a side note, we've experienced some fairly odd behaviors when you command checkpoint skips when you are not 'done', but we have not yet understood them well enough to enter them as issues).
